verses.kjv: Brethren, if a man be overtaken in a fault, ye which are spiritual, restore such an one in the spirit of meekness; considering thyself, lest thou also be tempted.
verses.web: Brothers, even if a man is caught in some fault, you who are spiritual must restore such a one in a spirit of gentleness; looking to yourself so that you also aren’t tempted.
verses.ct: Brothers and sisters, if someone among you gets caught up in a sin, those of you who are spiritually mature should gently help that person get back on track. But watch yourself — you could just as easily face the same temptation.

verses.kjv: Bear ye one another’s burdens, and so fulfil the law of Christ.
verses.web: Bear one another’s burdens, and so fulfill the law of Christ.
verses.ct: Carry each other's burdens. That's how you fulfill the law of Christ.

verses.kjv: For if a man think himself to be something, when he is nothing, he deceiveth himself.
verses.web: For if a man thinks himself to be something when he is nothing, he deceives himself.
verses.ct: If you think you're something special when you're really not, you're only fooling yourself.

verses.kjv: But let every man prove his own work, and then shall he have rejoicing in himself alone, and not in another.
verses.web: But let each man examine his own work, and then he will have reason to boast in himself, and not in someone else.
verses.ct: Each person should examine their own actions. Then if there's something to be proud of, it will be based on their own work — not on comparing themselves to someone else.

verses.kjv: For every man shall bear his own burden.
verses.web: For each man will bear his own burden.
verses.ct: After all, each person is responsible for carrying their own load.

verses.kjv: Let him that is taught in the word communicate unto him that teacheth in all good things.
verses.web: But let him who is taught in the word share all good things with him who teaches.
verses.ct: Anyone who is being taught the word should share all good things with the person who teaches them.

verses.kjv: Be not deceived; God is not mocked: for whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap.
verses.web: Don’t be deceived. God is not mocked, for whatever a man sows, that he will also reap.
verses.ct: Don't be fooled — no one makes a mockery of God. Whatever a person plants, that's exactly what they'll harvest.

verses.kjv: For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap corruption; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the Spirit reap life everlasting.
verses.web: For he who sows to his own flesh will from the flesh reap corruption. But he who sows to the Spirit will from the Spirit reap eternal life.
verses.ct: If you plant seeds to satisfy your sinful nature, you'll harvest decay and destruction from it. But if you plant seeds to satisfy the Holy Spirit, you'll harvest eternal life from the Spirit.

verses.kjv: And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.
verses.web: Let’s not be weary in doing good, for we will reap in due season, if we don’t give up.
verses.ct: So let's not get tired of doing what's right. When the time comes, we will reap a harvest — as long as we don't give up.

verses.kjv: As we have therefore opportunity, let us do good unto all men, especially unto them who are of the household of faith.
verses.web: So then, as we have opportunity, let’s do what is good toward all men, and especially toward those who are of the household of the faith.
verses.ct: Whenever we have the chance, then, let's do good to everyone — and especially to those who belong to the family of faith.

verses.kjv: Ye see how large a letter I have written unto you with mine own hand.
verses.web: See with what large letters I write to you with my own hand.
verses.ct: Look at how large these letters are — I'm writing this part to you with my own hand!

verses.kjv: As many as desire to make a fair shew in the flesh, they constrain you to be circumcised; only lest they should suffer persecution for the cross of Christ.
verses.web: As many as desire to make a good impression in the flesh compel you to be circumcised; just so they may not be persecuted for the cross of Christ.
verses.ct: The people pressuring you to be circumcised are only trying to look good outwardly. Their real motive is to avoid being persecuted for the cross of Christ.

verses.kjv: For neither they themselves who are circumcised keep the law; but desire to have you circumcised, that they may glory in your flesh.
verses.web: For even they who receive circumcision don’t keep the law themselves, but they desire to have you circumcised, that they may boast in your flesh.
verses.ct: Even those who are circumcised don't actually keep the law themselves. They just want you circumcised so they can brag about what they've done to your body.

verses.kjv: But God forbid that I should glory, save in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, by whom the world is crucified unto me, and I unto the world.
verses.web: But far be it from me to boast, except in the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ, through which the world has been crucified to me, and I to the world.
verses.ct: As for me, I will never boast about anything except the cross of our Lord Jesus Christ. Through that cross, the world has been crucified to me, and I to the world.

verses.kjv: For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth any thing, nor uncircumcision, but a new creature.
verses.web: For in Christ Jesus neither is circumcision anything, nor uncircumcision, but a new creation.
verses.ct: In Christ Jesus, it doesn't matter at all whether someone is circumcised or not. What matters is becoming a new creation.

verses.kjv: And as many as walk according to this rule, peace be on them, and mercy, and upon the Israel of God.
verses.web: As many as walk by this rule, peace and mercy be on them, and on God’s Israel.
verses.ct: For everyone who lives by this truth — peace and mercy be on them, and on the Israel of God.

verses.kjv: From henceforth let no man trouble me: for I bear in my body the marks of the Lord Jesus.
verses.web: From now on, let no one cause me any trouble, for I bear the marks of the Lord Jesus branded on my body.
verses.ct: From now on, let no one cause me trouble. I carry the marks of the Lord Jesus branded on my body.

verses.kjv: Brethren, the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit. Amen.
verses.web: The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit, brothers. Amen.
verses.ct: Brothers and sisters, may the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit. Amen.
